comment.author: 16139821@N05
comment._content: This is a picture of Mauds The Florist shop.I believe the woman in the overall to the right is Maud herself,if the photograph taken early 70,s

comment.author: 78301658@N07
comment._content: I used to work in the shop next door when it was a magazine stall around 1972...think it became the Electric shop a few years later....I moved around the corner to W. Robinsons Book Shop for around 7 years.....would be nice to see some of the old staff there like Billy, Mr Moore, Mr Rennie & Audrey (She was the grand Daughter of Stan Laurel ) plus a few more who's names iv forgot through time...I know Jimmy Forsythe took a few...
